title: Best Ingame LoL quotes?
body:
This one is my personal favorite: "Looks like the tables have turned. Unfortunately, the table is round." -Nex of Fides, League of Legends, 2014.

Tell me what you think and leave more quotes below if you want! {{champion:105}}

replies.body: Cry more, it only adds more stacks to my {{item:3070}}
"You trash players should be like me and learn to fill, its just that i can't play top, jungle, adc, support" -Random guy i saw in one of my **promo** games
tables have turned. means that we had a comeback. They are wining and now we are. But the table is round so how its turn......
